import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Modal, Button, Tab, Nav } from "react-bootstrap"; import "../styles/screens/DashboardScreen.css"; function PendingInvitesPopup({ show, onClose }) { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState("pendingFriendRequests"); // Dummy data for pending friend requests and group requests const pendingFriendRequests = [ { id: 1, name: "Friend 1" }, { id: 2, name: "Friend 2" }, { id: 1, name: "Friend 1" }, { id: 2, name: "Friend 2" }, { id: 1, name: "Friend 1" }, { id: 2, name: "Friend 2" }, { id: 1, name: "Friend 1" }, { id: 2, name: "Friend 2" }, { id: 1, name: "Friend 1" }, { id: 2, name: "Friend 2" }, { id: 1, name: "Friend 1" }, { id: 2, name: "Friend 2" }, // Add more friend requests ]; const pendingGroupRequests = [ { id: 1, name: "Group 1" }, { id: 2, name: "Group 2" }, // Add more group requests ]; const switchTab = (tabName) => { setActiveTab(tabName); }; return (
Pending Friend Requests setActiveTab("pendingGroupRequests") } > Pending Group Requests
    {pendingFriendRequests.map((request) => (
  • {request.name}
    • ))}
    {pendingGroupRequests.map((request) => (
  • {request.name}
    • ))}
); } export default PendingInvitesPopup;
